entry.title: MyClippings Haskell parser repository
entry.content:
Keyboard Maestro macro using MyClippings Haskell parser

A Keyboard Maestro macro which parses the MyClippings.txt file that Kindle uses to store highlights into a JSON-formatted representation. Uses Haskell language and Graham Huttonâ€™s parser combinators library.
